foreignData.name: Wunschkrallen-Talisman
foreignData.text:
Der Wunschkrallen-Talisman kommt mit drei Wunschmarken ins Spiel.
{1}, {T}, entferne eine Wunschmarke vom Wunschkrallen-Talisman: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Karte, nimm sie auf deine Hand und mische dann deine Bibliothek. Ein Gegner übernimmt die Kontrolle über den Wunschkrallen-Talisman. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur während deines Zuges.

foreignData.name: Talismán garra de los deseos
foreignData.text:
El Talismán garra de los deseos entra al campo de batalla con tres contadores de deseo sobre él.
{1}, {T}, remover un contador de deseo del Talismán garra de los deseos: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta, ponla en tu mano y luego baraja tu biblioteca. Un oponente gana el control del Talismán garra de los deseos. Activa esta habilidad solo durante tu turno.

foreignData.name: Talisman griffe de souhait
foreignData.text:
Le Talisman griffe de souhait arrive sur le champ de bataille avec, sur lui, trois marqueurs « souhait ».
{1}, {T}, retirez un marqueur « souhait » du Talisman griffe de souhait : Cherchez une carte dans votre bibliothèque, mettez-la dans votre main et mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque. Un adversaire acquiert le contrôle du Talisman griffe de souhait. N'activez cette capacité que pendant votre tour.

foreignData.name: Talismano della Grinfia dei Desideri
foreignData.text:
Il Talismano della Grinfia dei Desideri entra nel campo di battaglia con tre segnalini desiderio.
{1}, {T}, Rimuovi un segnalino desiderio dal Talismano della Grinfia dei Desideri: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta, aggiungila alla tua mano, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio. Un avversario prende il controllo del Talismano della Grinfia dei Desideri. Attiva questa abilità solo durante il tuo turno.

foreignData.name: 願い爪のタリスマン
foreignData.text:
願い爪のタリスマンは、願いカウンターが３個置かれた状態で戦場に出る。
{1}, {T}, 願い爪のタリスマンの上から願いカウンターを１個取り除く：あなたのライブラリーからカード１枚を探し、それをあなたの手札に加え、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。対戦相手１人は願い爪のタリスマンのコントロールを得る。この能力は、あなたのターンの間にのみ起動できる。

foreignData.name: 소원발톱 부적
foreignData.text:
소원발톱 부적은 소원 카운터 세 개를 가지고 전장에 들어온다.
{1}, {T}, 소원발톱 부적에서 소원 카운터 한 개를 제거한다: 당신의 서고에서 카드 한 장을 찾아, 당신의 손에 넣은 후, 당신의 서고를 섞는다. 상대 한 명이 소원발톱 부적의 조종권을 얻는다. 이 능력은 당신의 턴에만 활성화할 수 있다.

foreignData.name: Talismã de Garra dos Desejos
foreignData.text:
Talismã de Garra dos Desejos entra no campo de batalha com três marcadores de desejo.
{1}, {T}, remova um marcador de desejo de Talismã de Garra dos Desejos: Procure um card em seu grimório, coloque-o em sua mão, e depois embaralhe seu grimório. Um oponente ganha o controle de Talismã de Garra dos Desejos. Ative esta habilidade apenas durante o seu turno.

foreignData.name: Лапка Желаний
foreignData.text:
Лапка Желаний выходит на поле битвы с тремя жетонами желания на ней.
{1}, {T}, удалите один жетон желания с Лапки Желаний: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту, положите ее в вашу руку, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку. Оппонент получает контроль над Лапкой Желаний. Активируйте эту способность только во время вашего хода.

foreignData.name: 愿爪饰符
foreignData.text:
愿爪饰符进战场时上面有三个祈愿指示物。
{1}，{T}，从愿爪饰符上移去一个祈愿指示物：从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。任一对手获得愿爪饰符的操控权。只能于你的回合中起动此异能。

foreignData.name: 願爪飾符
foreignData.text:
願爪飾符進戰場時上面有三個祈願指示物。
{1}，{T}，從願爪飾符上移去一個祈願指示物：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張牌，將它置於你手上，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。任一對手獲得願爪飾符的操控權。只能於你的回合中起動此異能。

name: Wishclaw Talisman
originalText:
Wishclaw Talisman enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.
{1}, {T}, Remove a wish counter from Wishclaw Talisman: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. An opponent gains control of Wishclaw Talisman. Activate this ability only during your turn.

rulings.text: Once Wishclaw Talisman runs out of wish counters, it remains on the battlefield. You can’t activate its last ability at all.
You choose which opponent gains control of Wishclaw Talisman while its ability is resolving. If that player later leaves the game, you regain control of Wishclaw Talisman.

text:
Wishclaw Talisman enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.
{1}, {T}, Remove a wish counter from Wishclaw Talisman: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. An opponent gains control of Wishclaw Talisman. Activate this ability only during your turn.

flavorText: The elves remember every secret path from the days when they ruled the realm.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Elfen erinnern sich an jeden geheimen Pfad aus der Zeit, als sie das Reich beherrschten.
foreignData.name: Eichenheim-Widersacher
foreignData.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken {2} weniger, falls ein Gegner eine grüne bleibende Karte kontrolliert.
Todesberührung
Immer wenn der Eichenheim-Widersacher einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Los elfos recuerdan todos los senderos ocultos de la época en la que gobernaban el reino.
foreignData.name: Adversario de Roblehogar
foreignData.text:
Te cuesta {2} lanzar este hechizo si un oponente controla un permanente verde.
Toque mortal.
Siempre que el Adversario de Roblehogar haga daño de combate a un jugador, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Les elfes se souviennent de tous les passages secrets du temps où ils régnaient sur le royaume.
foreignData.name: Adversaire de Gitechêne
foreignData.text:
Ce sort coûte {2} de moins à lancer si un adversaire contrôle un permanent vert.
Contact mortel
À chaque fois que l'Adversaire de Gitechêne inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli elfi ricordano ogni passaggio segreto dai tempi in cui governavano il reame.
foreignData.name: Avversario di Quercetania
foreignData.text:
Questa magia costa {2} in meno per essere lanciata se il tuo avversario controlla un permanente verde.
Tocco letale
Ogniqualvolta l'Avversario di Quercetania infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: エルフたちは、かつて王国を支配していたころの秘密の道を今でも覚えている。
foreignData.name: オークヘイムの敵対者
foreignData.text:
対戦相手が緑のパーマネントをコントロールしているなら、この呪文を唱えるためのコストは{2}少なくなる。
接死
オークヘイムの敵対者がプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、カードを１枚引く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エルフ・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: 엘프들은 그들이 왕국을 지배했던 때부터 있었던 모든 비밀 통로들을 기억한다.
foreignData.name: 오크헤임의 적수
foreignData.text:
상대가 녹색 지속물을 조종한다면 이 주문은 발동하는 데 {2}가 덜 든다.
치명타
오크헤임의 적수가 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Os elfos se lembram de todas as trilhas secretas dos tempos em que governavam o reino.
foreignData.name: Adversário de Carvalhândia
foreignData.text:
Esta mágica custa {2} a menos para ser conjurada se seu oponente controla uma permanente verde.
Toque mortífero
Toda vez que Adversário de Carvalhândia causar dano de combate a um jogador, compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: Эльфы помнят каждую потайную тропинку еще с тех времен, когда они правили королевством.
foreignData.name: Противник из Дуболесья
foreignData.text:
Разыгрывание этого заклинания стоит на {2} меньше, если под контролем оппонента есть зеленый перманент.
Смертельное касание
Каждый раз, когда Противник из Дуболесья наносит боевые повреждения игроку, возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 妖精还记得他们称雄世境期间留下的每条秘密通路。
foreignData.name: 橡树宫仇敌
foreignData.text:
如果任一对手操控绿色永久物，则此咒语减少{2}来施放。
死触
每当橡树宫仇敌对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 妖精還記得他們稱雄世境期間留下的每條秘密通路。
foreignData.name: 橡樹宮仇敵
foreignData.text:
如果任一對手操控綠色永久物，則此咒語減少{2}來施放。
死觸
每當橡樹宮仇敵對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，抽一張牌。

name: Oakhame Adversary
originalText:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if an opponent controls a green permanent.
Deathtouch
Whenever Oakhame Adversary deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if an opponent controls a green permanent.
Deathtouch
Whenever Oakhame Adversary deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

flavorText: From here, the path to anywhere may be found.

foreignData.flavorText: Von hier aus kann man den Pfad nach überall finden.
foreignData.name: Sagenumwobener Durchgang
foreignData.text: {T}, opfere den Sagenumwobenen Durchgang: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte, bringe sie getappt ins Spiel und mische dann deine Bibliothek. Falls du dann vier oder mehr Länder kontrollierst, enttappe das Land.

foreignData.flavorText: Desde aquí se puede encontrar el camino a cualquier lugar.
foreignData.name: Pasaje de leyenda
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrificar el Paisaje de leyenda: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, ponla en el campo de batalla girada y luego baraja tu biblioteca. Luego, si controlas cuatro o más tierras, endereza esa tierra.

foreignData.flavorText: D'ici, vous pouvez trouver un chemin menant partout.
foreignData.name: Passage merveilleux
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrifiez le Passage merveilleux : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée et mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque. Puis, si vous contrôlez au moins quatre terrains, dégagez ce terrain.

foreignData.flavorText: Da qui si può trovare il sentiero per qualsiasi luogo.
foreignData.name: Passaggio Leggendario
foreignData.text: {T}, Sacrifica il Passaggio Leggendario: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base, mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio. Poi, se controlli quattro o più terre, STAPpa quella terra.

foreignData.flavorText: ここからなら、どこへ行く道でも見つかるかもしれない。
foreignData.name: 寓話の小道
foreignData.text: {T}, 寓話の小道を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カード１枚を探してタップ状態で戦場に出し、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。その後あなたが土地を４つ以上コントロールしているなら、その土地をアンタップする。

foreignData.flavorText: 그곳에서부터는, 어디로 가는 길이든 찾을 수 있다.
foreignData.name: 전설적인 통로
foreignData.text: {T}, 전설적인 통로를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아, 탭된 상태로 전장에 놓은 후, 당신의 서고를 섞는다. 그 후, 당신이 대지를 네 개 이상 조종한다면, 그 대지를 언탭한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Daqui é possível achar o caminho para qualquer lugar.
foreignData.name: Passagem Fabulosa
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrifique Passagem Fabulosa: Procure um card de terreno básico em seu grimório, coloque-o no campo de batalha virado e depois embaralhe seu grimório. Se você controla quatro ou mais terrenos, desvire aquele terreno.

foreignData.flavorText: Отсюда можно найти дорогу куда угодно.
foreignData.name: Сказочный Проход
foreignData.text: {T}, пожертвуйте Сказочный Проход: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли, положите ее на поле битвы повернутой, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку. Затем, если вы контролируете не менее четырех земель, разверните ту землю.

foreignData.flavorText: 此处密径错杂，寻对道路便可通达八方。
foreignData.name: 神奇小径
foreignData.text: {T}，牺牲神奇小径：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。然后如果你操控四个或更多地，则重置该地。

foreignData.flavorText: 此處密徑錯雜，尋對道路便可通達八方。
foreignData.name: 神奇小徑
foreignData.text: {T}，犧牲神奇小徑：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，將之橫置放進戰場，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。然後如果你操控四個或更多地，則重置該地。

name: Fabled Passage
originalText: {T}, Sacrifice Fabled Passage: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Then if you control four or more lands, untap that land.

rulings.text: The land that you put onto the battlefield will be counted when determining whether you control four or more lands, but Fabled Passage will not.
If you control four or more lands, the basic land doesn’t enter the battlefield untapped; it enters tapped and then you untap it.

text: {T}, Sacrifice Fabled Passage: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Then if you control four or more lands, untap that land.

flavorText: In the wilds, the ravens steal far more than baubles.

foreignData.flavorText: In der Wildnis stehlen die Raben weit mehr als nur Tand.
foreignData.name: Gedankenraub
foreignData.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du bestimmst davon eine Nichtland-Karte. Der Spieler wirft die bestimmte Karte ab. Du kannst eine Karte mit einem Abenteuer, die der Spieler besitzt, aus dem Exil auf den Friedhof des Spielers legen.

foreignData.flavorText: En las tierras salvajes, los cuervos no solo roban baratijas.
foreignData.name: Robo de recuerdos
foreignData.text: El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Tú eliges de ahí una carta que no sea tierra. Ese jugador descarta esa carta. Puedes poner en el cementerio de ese jugador desde el exilio una carta de la cual ese jugador sea propietario que tenga una Aventura.

foreignData.flavorText: Dans les friches, les corbeaux ne volent pas que des babioles.
foreignData.name: Vol de mémoire
foreignData.text: L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Vous y choisissez une carte non-terrain. Ce joueur se défausse de cette carte. Vous pouvez mettre, depuis l'exil, une carte avec une aventure que ce joueur possède dans le cimetière de ce joueur.

foreignData.flavorText: Nelle terre selvagge, i corvi rubano molto più che gingilli.
foreignData.name: Sottrazione di Memoria
foreignData.text: Un avversario bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra da quella mano. Quel giocatore scarta quella carta. Puoi mettere una carta che ha un'Avventura e di cui quel giocatore è proprietario dall'esilio nel cimitero di quel giocatore.

foreignData.flavorText: 僻境では、カラスが盗むのはつまらない物ではない。
foreignData.name: 記憶盗み
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中から土地でないカード１枚を選ぶ。そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。あなたは、追放領域からそのプレイヤーがオーナーであり出来事を持つカード１枚を、そのプレイヤーの墓地に置いてもよい。

foreignData.flavorText: 야생지에서, 까마귀들은 그냥 반짝이는 것들보다 더 많은 것들을 훔친다.
foreignData.name: 기억 도둑

name: Memory Theft
originalText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.

rulings.text: You choose which exiled adventurer card, if any, to put into that player’s graveyard after seeing their hand. You may do this even if that player has no nonland cards in hand, or even no cards at all.
Memory Theft allows you to put any face-up exiled card with an Adventure that player owns into their graveyard, not just one that was cast as an Adventure and exiled.

An effect may refer to a card, spell, or permanent that “has an Adventure.” This refers to a card, spell, or permanent that has an adventurer card’s set of alternative characteristics, even if they’re not being used and even if that card was never cast as an Adventure.
If an effect refers to a creature card, creature spell, or creature that has an Adventure, it won’t find an instant or sorcery spell on the stack that’s been cast as an Adventure.

text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.

name: Emry, Lurker of the Loch
originalText: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard. {T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Emry). The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
The cost reduction ability reduces only the generic mana in Emry’s cost. The colored mana must still be paid.
Once you announce that you’re casting a spell, no player may take actions until the spell has been paid for. Notably, opponents can’t try to change by how much Emry’s cost is reduced.
If Emry’s last ability targets an artifact land card, you can’t play it. Effects that allow you to “cast” a card don’t allow you to play a land card.

You must follow the normal timing permissions and restrictions for the target artifact card. Unless it has flash, you’ll most likely only be able to cast it during your main phase while the stack is empty.
You’ll still pay all costs for a spell cast this way, including additional costs. You may also pay alternative costs if any are available.
Casting the target card causes it to leave your graveyard and become a new object. You can’t cast it again if it returns to your graveyard this turn.

text:

name: Henge Walker
originalText: Adamant — If at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast this spell, Henge Walker enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

rulings.text: If an effect allows you to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, you can’t choose to cast it and pay unless another rule or effect allows you to cast that spell for a cost. Similarly, you can’t waive a cost reduction unless that effect says you may.

Adamant effects check what mana was actually spent to cast a spell. If an effect allows you to spend mana “as though it were mana” of any color or type, that allows you to spend mana you couldn’t otherwise spend, but it doesn’t change what mana you spent to cast the spell.
If you copy a spell that has an adamant ability, no mana was spent to cast the copy at all, so that ability won’t apply.

text: Adamant — If at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast this spell, Henge Walker enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Witch's Vengeance
originalText: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.

rulings.text: You choose a creature type as Witch’s Vengeance resolves, not as you cast it. No player may take actions between the time you choose a creature type and the time those creatures get -3/-3.

To choose a creature type, you must choose an existing creature type, such as Human or Knight. You can’t choose multiple creature types, such as “Human Knight,” but choosing “Human” is enough to affect a Human Knight. Card types such as artifact can’t be chosen; nor can supertypes such as legendary; nor can subtypes that aren’t creature types, such as Vehicle.

Witch’s Vengeance affects only creatures of the chosen type that are on the battlefield at the time it resolves. This includes creatures you control, creatures with hexproof, and creatures with protection from black. Creatures that enter the battlefield or become the chosen type later in the turn won’t get -3/-3.

text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.

foreignData.name: Emry, Wächterin des Sees
foreignData.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken für jedes Artefakt, das du kontrollierst, {1} weniger.
Wenn Emry, Wächterin des Sees, ins Spiel kommt, lege die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof.
{T}: Bestimme eine Artefaktkarte deiner Wahl in deinem Friedhof. Du kannst sie in diesem Zug wirken. (Du bezahlst immer noch ihre Kosten. Zeitpunkts-Einschränkungen gelten weiterhin.)

foreignData.name: Emry, acechadora del lago
foreignData.text:
Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar este hechizo por cada artefacto que controlas.
Cuando Emry, acechadora del lago entre al campo de batalla, pon las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio.
{T}: Elige una carta de artefacto objetivo en tu cementerio. Puedes lanzar esa carta este turno. (Sigues pagando sus costes. Las reglas sobre cuándo jugarla se siguen aplicando.)

foreignData.name: Emry, guetteuse du loch
foreignData.text:
Ce sort coûte {1} de moins à lancer pour chaque artefact que vous contrôlez.
Quand Emry, guetteuse du loch arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque dans votre cimetière.
{T} : Choisissez une carte d'artefact ciblée dans votre cimetière. Vous pouvez lancer cette carte ce tour-ci. (Vous payez toujours ses coûts. Les restrictions de temps s'appliquent quand même.)

foreignData.name: Emry, Nascosta nel Loch
foreignData.text:
Questa magia costa {1} in meno per essere lanciata per ogni artefatto che controlli.
Quando Emry, Nascosta nel Loch entra nel campo di battaglia, metti nel tuo cimitero le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio.
{T}: Scegli una carta artefatto bersaglio nel tuo cimitero. Puoi lanciare quella carta in questo turno. (Paghi comunque i suoi costi. Le regole sulla tempistica si applicano comunque.)

foreignData.name: 湖に潜む者、エムリー
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるためのコストは、あなたがコントロールしているアーティファクト１つにつき{1}少なくなる。
湖に潜む者、エムリーが戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを４枚あなたの墓地に置く。
{T}：あなたの墓地にあるアーティファクト・カード１枚を対象とする。このターン、あなたはそのカードを唱えてもよい。（そのコストは支払う必要がある。タイミングのルールも依然として適用される。）
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — マーフォーク・ウィザード

foreignData.name: 호수 배회자, 엠리
foreignData.text:
이 주문은 당신이 조종하는 마법물체 한 개당 발동하는 비용이 {1}만큼 덜 든다.
호수 배회자, 엠리가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 네 장을 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
{T}: 당신의 무덤에 있는 마법물체 카드를 목표로 정한다. 당신은 이 턴에 그 카드를 발동할 수 있다. (여전히 발동 비용은 지불해야 한다. 발동 시기 규칙도 여전히 적용된다.)

foreignData.name: Emry, Espreitadora do Lago
foreignData.text:
Esta mágica custa {1} a menos para ser conjurada para cada artefato que você controla.
Quando Emry, Espreitadora do Lago, entrar no campo de batalha, coloque os quatro cards do topo de seu grimório em seu cemitério.
{T}: Escolha um card de artefato alvo em seu cemitério. Você pode conjurar aquele card neste turno. (Você ainda paga seus custos. As regras de tempo ainda se aplicam.)

foreignData.name: Эмри, Таящаяся в Озере
foreignData.text:
Разыгрывание этого заклинания стоит на {1} меньше за каждый артефакт под вашим контролем.
Когда Эмри, Таящаяся в Озере выходит на поле битвы, положите четыре верхние карты вашей библиотеки на ваше кладбище.
{T}: выберите целевую карту артефакта на вашем кладбище. Вы можете разыграть ту карту в этом ходу. (Вы должны оплатить ее стоимости. Ограничения по времени продолжают действовать.)

foreignData.name: 深湖潜妖艾莉
foreignData.text:
你每操控一个神器，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。
当深湖潜妖艾莉进战场时，将你牌库顶的四张牌置入你的坟墓场。
{T}：选择目标在你坟墓场中的神器牌。本回合中，你可以施放该牌。（你依旧要支付其费用，且仍须遵守施放时机规则。）

foreignData.name: 深湖潛妖艾莉
foreignData.text:
你每操控一個神器，此咒語便減少{1}來施放。
當深湖潛妖艾莉進戰場時，將你牌庫頂的四張牌置入你的墳墓場。
{T}：選擇目標在你墳墓場中的神器牌。本回合中，你可以施放該牌。（你依舊要支付其費用，且仍須遵守施放時機規則。）

name: Emry, Lurker of the Loch
originalText: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard. {T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Emry). The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
The cost reduction ability reduces only the generic mana in Emry’s cost. The colored mana must still be paid.
Once you announce that you’re casting a spell, no player may take actions until the spell has been paid for. Notably, opponents can’t try to change by how much Emry’s cost is reduced.
If Emry’s last ability targets an artifact land card, you can’t play it. Effects that allow you to “cast” a card don’t allow you to play a land card.

You must follow the normal timing permissions and restrictions for the target artifact card. Unless it has flash, you’ll most likely only be able to cast it during your main phase while the stack is empty.
You’ll still pay all costs for a spell cast this way, including additional costs. You may also pay alternative costs if any are available.
Casting the target card causes it to leave your graveyard and become a new object. You can’t cast it again if it returns to your graveyard this turn.

You’ll still pay all costs for a spell cast this way, including additional costs. You may also pay alternative costs if any are available.
Casting the target card causes it to leave your graveyard and become a new object. You can’t cast it again if it returns to your graveyard this turn.

text:

When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.
{T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

name: Witch's Vengeance
originalText: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.

rulings.text: You choose a creature type as Witch’s Vengeance resolves, not as you cast it. No player may take actions between the time you choose a creature type and the time those creatures get -3/-3.

To choose a creature type, you must choose an existing creature type, such as Human or Knight. You can’t choose multiple creature types, such as “Human Knight,” but choosing “Human” is enough to affect a Human Knight. Card types such as artifact can’t be chosen; nor can supertypes such as legendary; nor can subtypes that aren’t creature types, such as Vehicle.

Witch’s Vengeance affects only creatures of the chosen type that are on the battlefield at the time it resolves. This includes creatures you control, creatures with hexproof, and creatures with protection from black. Creatures that enter the battlefield or become the chosen type later in the turn won’t get -3/-3.

name: Memory Theft
originalText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.

rulings.text: You choose which exiled adventurer card, if any, to put into that player’s graveyard after seeing their hand. You may do this even if that player has no nonland cards in hand, or even no cards at all.
Memory Theft allows you to put any face-up exiled card with an Adventure that player owns into their graveyard, not just one that was cast as an Adventure and exiled.

An effect may refer to a card, spell, or permanent that “has an Adventure.” This refers to a card, spell, or permanent that has an adventurer card’s set of alternative characteristics, even if they’re not being used and even if that card was never cast as an Adventure.
If an effect refers to a creature card, creature spell, or creature that has an Adventure, it won’t find an instant or sorcery spell on the stack that’s been cast as an Adventure.

text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.

name: Seasonal Ritual
originalText: Add one mana of any color. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

rulings.text: An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it’s in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose converted mana cost is 1. It can’t be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card’s normal characteristics. The spell’s color, mana cost, converted mana cost, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it’s legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can’t cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner’s graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won’t be exiled and the spell’s controller won’t be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won’t give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you’ll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it’s not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it’s a token) or cease to be a copy (if it’s a nontoken permanent), and so you won’t be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn’t casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

text: Add one mana of any color. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

name: Memory Theft
originalText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.

rulings.text: You choose which exiled adventurer card, if any, to put into that player’s graveyard after seeing their hand. You may do this even if that player has no nonland cards in hand, or even no cards at all.
Memory Theft allows you to put any face-up exiled card with an Adventure that player owns into their graveyard, not just one that was cast as an Adventure and exiled.

An effect may refer to a card, spell, or permanent that “has an Adventure.” This refers to a card, spell, or permanent that has an adventurer card’s set of alternative characteristics, even if they’re not being used and even if that card was never cast as an Adventure.
If an effect refers to a creature card, creature spell, or creature that has an Adventure, it won’t find an instant or sorcery spell on the stack that’s been cast as an Adventure.

text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.

flavorText: "Old battlefields make great gardens. So rich from the blood of the fallen."

foreignData.name: Jahreszeiten-Ritual
foreignData.text: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe. (Schicke diese Karte dann ins Exil. Du kannst sie später als Kreatur aus dem Exil wirken.)

foreignData.name: Ritual de temporada
foreignData.text: Agrega un maná de cualquier color. (Luego, exilia esta carta. Puedes lanzar la criatura más adelante desde el exilio.)

foreignData.name: Rituel saisonnier
foreignData.text: Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix. (Puis exilez cette carte. Vous pouvez lancer la créature plus tard depuis l'exil.)

foreignData.name: Rito Stagionale
foreignData.text: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore. (Poi esilia questa carta. Puoi lanciare la creatura in seguito dall'esilio.)

foreignData.name: 季（き）節（せつ）の儀（ぎ）式（しき）
foreignData.text: 好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。（その後、このカードを追放する。あなたは後で追放領域からこのクリーチャーを唱えてもよい。）
foreignData.type: ソーサリー ― 出来事

foreignData.name: 계절 의식
foreignData.text: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다. (그 후 이 카드를 추방한다. 당신은 나중에 추방 영역에서 이 생물을 발동할 수 있다.)

foreignData.name: Ritual Sazonal
foreignData.text: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor. (Depois, exile este card. Você pode conjurar a criatura posteriormente do exílio.)

foreignData.name: Сезонный Ритуал
foreignData.text: Добавьте одну ману любого цвета. (Затем изгоните эту карту. Позже вы можете разыграть эту карту как существо из изгнания.)

foreignData.name: 季节仪式
foreignData.text: 加一点任意颜色的法术力。（然后放逐此牌。之后你还可以从放逐区中施放该生物。）

foreignData.name: 季節儀式
foreignData.text: 加一點任意顏色的魔法力。（然後放逐此牌。之後你還可以從放逐區中施放該生物。）

name: Seasonal Ritual
originalText: Add one mana of any color. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

rulings.text: An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it’s in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose converted mana cost is 1. It can’t be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card’s normal characteristics. The spell’s color, mana cost, converted mana cost, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it’s legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can’t cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner’s graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won’t be exiled and the spell’s controller won’t be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won’t give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you’ll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it’s not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it’s a token) or cease to be a copy (if it’s a nontoken permanent), and so you won’t be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn’t casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

text: Add one mana of any color. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

flavorText: "If you're in our home, we expect you to mind your manners."

foreignData.flavorText: „Wenn du bei uns zu Hause bist, erwarten wir, dass du auf deine Manieren achtest."
foreignData.name: Wie heißt das Zauberwort
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Sein Beherrscher legt die obersten drei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.

foreignData.flavorText: "Si estás en nuestro territorio, esperamos que cuides tus modales".
foreignData.name: No dijiste por favor
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. Su controlador pone las tres primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText: « Si tu viens chez nous, tu dois faire attention à tes manières. »
foreignData.name: Fallait dire « S'il te plaît » !
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé. Son contrôleur met les trois cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: "Quando sei in casa nostra, ci aspettiamo che rispetti le buone maniere."
foreignData.name: Non Hai Detto "Per Favore"
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio. Il suo controllore mette nel proprio cimitero le prime tre carte del proprio grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「私たちの家にいるときは、礼儀をわきまえなさい。」
foreignData.name: 無礼の罰
foreignData.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。それのコントローラーは、自分のライブラリーの一番上からカードを３枚自分の墓地に置く。

foreignData.flavorText: "우리 집에 있는 동안에는, 예의범절을 갖췄으면 좋겠네."
foreignData.name: 부탁을 했어야지
foreignData.text: 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다. 그 주문의 조종자는 자신의 서고 맨 위 카드 세 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Se você vem à nossa casa, esperamos que você se comporte."
foreignData.name: Não Disse Por Favor
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica alvo. Seu controlador coloca os três cards do topo do próprio grimório no próprio cemitério.

foreignData.flavorText: «Когда ты у нас дома, веди себя прилично».
foreignData.name: Скажи Волшебное Слово
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое заклинание. Контролирующий его игрок кладет три верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.

foreignData.flavorText: 「你进到我们家，就该讲礼貌。」
foreignData.name: 礼数未至
foreignData.text: 反击目标咒语。该咒语的操控者将其牌库顶的三张牌置入其坟墓场。

foreignData.flavorText: 「你進到我們家，就該講禮貌。」
foreignData.name: 禮數未至
foreignData.text: 反擊目標咒語。該咒語的操控者將其牌庫頂的三張牌置入其墳墓場。

name: Didn't Say Please
originalText: Counter target spell. Its controller puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

rulings.text: A spell that can’t be countered is a legal target for Didn’t Say Please. The spell won’t be countered when Didn’t Say Please resolves, but its controller still puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

text: Counter target spell. Its controller puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

flavorText: The elves remember every secret path from the days when they ruled the realm.

如果任一對手操控綠色永久物，則此咒語減少{2}來施放。
死觸

name: Oakhame Adversary
originalText:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if an opponent controls a green permanent.
Deathtouch
Whenever Oakhame Adversary deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if an opponent controls a green permanent.
Deathtouch
Whenever Oakhame Adversary deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

flavorText: From here, the path to anywhere may be found.

foreignData.flavorText: Von hier aus kann man den Pfad nach überall finden.
foreignData.name: Sagenumwobener Durchgang
foreignData.text: {T}, opfere den Sagenumwobenen Durchgang: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte, bringe sie getappt ins Spiel und mische dann deine Bibliothek. Falls du dann vier oder mehr Länder kontrollierst, enttappe das Land.

foreignData.flavorText: Desde aquí se puede encontrar el camino a cualquier lugar.
foreignData.name: Pasaje de leyenda
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrificar el Paisaje de leyenda: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, ponla en el campo de batalla girada y luego baraja tu biblioteca. Luego, si controlas cuatro o más tierras, endereza esa tierra.

foreignData.flavorText: D'ici, vous pouvez trouver un chemin menant partout.
foreignData.name: Passage merveilleux
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrifiez le Passage merveilleux : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée et mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque. Puis, si vous contrôlez au moins quatre terrains, dégagez ce terrain.

foreignData.flavorText: Da qui si può trovare il sentiero per qualsiasi luogo.
foreignData.name: Passaggio Leggendario
foreignData.text: {T}, Sacrifica il Passaggio Leggendario: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base, mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio. Poi, se controlli quattro o più terre, STAPpa quella terra.

foreignData.flavorText: ここからなら、どこへ行く道でも見つかるかもしれない。
foreignData.name: 寓話の小道
foreignData.text: {T}, 寓話の小道を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カード１枚を探してタップ状態で戦場に出し、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。その後あなたが土地を４つ以上コントロールしているなら、その土地をアンタップする。

foreignData.flavorText: 그곳에서부터는, 어디로 가는 길이든 찾을 수 있다.
foreignData.name: 전설적인 통로
foreignData.text: {T}, 전설적인 통로를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아, 탭된 상태로 전장에 놓은 후, 당신의 서고를 섞는다. 그 후, 당신이 대지를 네 개 이상 조종한다면, 그 대지를 언탭한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Daqui é possível achar o caminho para qualquer lugar.
foreignData.name: Passagem Fabulosa
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrifique Passagem Fabulosa: Procure um card de terreno básico em seu grimório, coloque-o no campo de batalha virado e depois embaralhe seu grimório. Se você controla quatro ou mais terrenos, desvire aquele terreno.

foreignData.flavorText: Отсюда можно найти дорогу куда угодно.
foreignData.name: Сказочный Проход
foreignData.text: {T}, пожертвуйте Сказочный Проход: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли, положите ее на поле битвы повернутой, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку. Затем, если вы контролируете не менее четырех земель, разверните ту землю.

foreignData.flavorText: 此处密径错杂，寻对道路便可通达八方。
foreignData.name: 神奇小径
foreignData.text: {T}，牺牲神奇小径：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。然后如果你操控四个或更多地，则重置该地。

foreignData.flavorText: 此處密徑錯雜，尋對道路便可通達八方。
foreignData.name: 神奇小徑
foreignData.text: {T}，犧牲神奇小徑：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，將之橫置放進戰場，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。然後如果你操控四個或更多地，則重置該地。

name: Fabled Passage
originalText: {T}, Sacrifice Fabled Passage: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Then if you control four or more lands, untap that land.

rulings.text: The land that you put onto the battlefield will be counted when determining whether you control four or more lands, but Fabled Passage will not.
If you control four or more lands, the basic land doesn’t enter the battlefield untapped; it enters tapped and then you untap it.

text: {T}, Sacrifice Fabled Passage: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Then if you control four or more lands, untap that land.

name: Seasonal Ritual
originalText: Add one mana of any color. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

rulings.text: An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it’s in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose converted mana cost is 1. It can’t be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card’s normal characteristics. The spell’s color, mana cost, converted mana cost, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it’s legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can’t cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner’s graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won’t be exiled and the spell’s controller won’t be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won’t give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you’ll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it’s not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it’s a token) or cease to be a copy (if it’s a nontoken permanent), and so you won’t be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn’t casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

name: Emry, Lurker of the Loch
originalText: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard. {T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Emry). The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
The cost reduction ability reduces only the generic mana in Emry’s cost. The colored mana must still be paid.
Once you announce that you’re casting a spell, no player may take actions until the spell has been paid for. Notably, opponents can’t try to change by how much Emry’s cost is reduced.
If Emry’s last ability targets an artifact land card, you can’t play it. Effects that allow you to “cast” a card don’t allow you to play a land card.

You must follow the normal timing permissions and restrictions for the target artifact card. Unless it has flash, you’ll most likely only be able to cast it during your main phase while the stack is empty.
You’ll still pay all costs for a spell cast this way, including additional costs. You may also pay alternative costs if any are available.
Casting the target card causes it to leave your graveyard and become a new object. You can’t cast it again if it returns to your graveyard this turn.

name: Henge Walker
originalText: Adamant — If at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast this spell, Henge Walker enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

rulings.text: If an effect allows you to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, you can’t choose to cast it and pay unless another rule or effect allows you to cast that spell for a cost. Similarly, you can’t waive a cost reduction unless that effect says you may.

Adamant effects check what mana was actually spent to cast a spell. If an effect allows you to spend mana “as though it were mana” of any color or type, that allows you to spend mana you couldn’t otherwise spend, but it doesn’t change what mana you spent to cast the spell.
If you copy a spell that has an adamant ability, no mana was spent to cast the copy at all, so that ability won’t apply.

{1}, {T}, 소원발톱 부적에서 소원 카운터 한 개를 제거한다: 당신의 서고에서 카드 한 장을 찾아, 당신의 손에 넣은 후, 당신의 서고를 섞는다. 상대 한 명이 소원발톱 부적의 조종권을 얻는다. 이 능력은 당신의 턴에만 활성화할 수 있다.

name: Wishclaw Talisman
originalText:

rulings.text: Once Wishclaw Talisman runs out of wish counters, it remains on the battlefield. You can’t activate its last ability at all.

name: Henge Walker
originalText: Adamant — If at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast this spell, Henge Walker enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

rulings.text: If an effect allows you to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, you can’t choose to cast it and pay unless another rule or effect allows you to cast that spell for a cost. Similarly, you can’t waive a cost reduction unless that effect says you may.

Adamant effects check what mana was actually spent to cast a spell. If an effect allows you to spend mana “as though it were mana” of any color or type, that allows you to spend mana you couldn’t otherwise spend, but it doesn’t change what mana you spent to cast the spell.
If you copy a spell that has an adamant ability, no mana was spent to cast the copy at all, so that ability won’t apply.

text: Adamant — If at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast this spell, Henge Walker enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Seasonal Ritual
originalText: Add one mana of any color. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

rulings.text: An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it’s in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose converted mana cost is 1. It can’t be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card’s normal characteristics. The spell’s color, mana cost, converted mana cost, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it’s legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can’t cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner’s graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won’t be exiled and the spell’s controller won’t be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won’t give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you’ll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it’s not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it’s a token) or cease to be a copy (if it’s a nontoken permanent), and so you won’t be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn’t casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

name: Henge Walker
originalText: Adamant — If at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast this spell, Henge Walker enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

rulings.text: If an effect allows you to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, you can’t choose to cast it and pay unless another rule or effect allows you to cast that spell for a cost. Similarly, you can’t waive a cost reduction unless that effect says you may.

Adamant effects check what mana was actually spent to cast a spell. If an effect allows you to spend mana “as though it were mana” of any color or type, that allows you to spend mana you couldn’t otherwise spend, but it doesn’t change what mana you spent to cast the spell.
If you copy a spell that has an adamant ability, no mana was spent to cast the copy at all, so that ability won’t apply.

text: Adamant — If at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast this spell, Henge Walker enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Emry, Lurker of the Loch
originalText: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard. {T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Emry). The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
The cost reduction ability reduces only the generic mana in Emry’s cost. The colored mana must still be paid.
Once you announce that you’re casting a spell, no player may take actions until the spell has been paid for. Notably, opponents can’t try to change by how much Emry’s cost is reduced.
If Emry’s last ability targets an artifact land card, you can’t play it. Effects that allow you to “cast” a card don’t allow you to play a land card.

You must follow the normal timing permissions and restrictions for the target artifact card. Unless it has flash, you’ll most likely only be able to cast it during your main phase while the stack is empty.
You’ll still pay all costs for a spell cast this way, including additional costs. You may also pay alternative costs if any are available.
Casting the target card causes it to leave your graveyard and become a new object. You can’t cast it again if it returns to your graveyard this turn.

name: Henge Walker
originalText: Adamant — If at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast this spell, Henge Walker enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

rulings.text: If an effect allows you to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, you can’t choose to cast it and pay unless another rule or effect allows you to cast that spell for a cost. Similarly, you can’t waive a cost reduction unless that effect says you may.

Adamant effects check what mana was actually spent to cast a spell. If an effect allows you to spend mana “as though it were mana” of any color or type, that allows you to spend mana you couldn’t otherwise spend, but it doesn’t change what mana you spent to cast the spell.
If you copy a spell that has an adamant ability, no mana was spent to cast the copy at all, so that ability won’t apply.

text: Adamant — If at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast this spell, Henge Walker enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

foreignData.name: Emry, Wächterin des Sees
foreignData.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken für jedes Artefakt, das du kontrollierst, {1} weniger.
Wenn Emry, Wächterin des Sees, ins Spiel kommt, lege die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof.
{T}: Bestimme eine Artefaktkarte deiner Wahl in deinem Friedhof. Du kannst sie in diesem Zug wirken. (Du bezahlst immer noch ihre Kosten. Zeitpunkts-Einschränkungen gelten weiterhin.)

foreignData.name: Emry, acechadora del lago
foreignData.text:
Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar este hechizo por cada artefacto que controlas.
Cuando Emry, acechadora del lago entre al campo de batalla, pon las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio.
{T}: Elige una carta de artefacto objetivo en tu cementerio. Puedes lanzar esa carta este turno. (Sigues pagando sus costes. Las reglas sobre cuándo jugarla se siguen aplicando.)

foreignData.name: Emry, guetteuse du loch
foreignData.text:
Ce sort coûte {1} de moins à lancer pour chaque artefact que vous contrôlez.
Quand Emry, guetteuse du loch arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque dans votre cimetière.
{T} : Choisissez une carte d'artefact ciblée dans votre cimetière. Vous pouvez lancer cette carte ce tour-ci. (Vous payez toujours ses coûts. Les restrictions de temps s'appliquent quand même.)

foreignData.name: Emry, Nascosta nel Loch
foreignData.text:
Questa magia costa {1} in meno per essere lanciata per ogni artefatto che controlli.
Quando Emry, Nascosta nel Loch entra nel campo di battaglia, metti nel tuo cimitero le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio.
{T}: Scegli una carta artefatto bersaglio nel tuo cimitero. Puoi lanciare quella carta in questo turno. (Paghi comunque i suoi costi. Le regole sulla tempistica si applicano comunque.)

foreignData.name: 湖に潜む者、エムリー
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるためのコストは、あなたがコントロールしているアーティファクト１つにつき{1}少なくなる。
湖に潜む者、エムリーが戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを４枚あなたの墓地に置く。
{T}：あなたの墓地にあるアーティファクト・カード１枚を対象とする。このターン、あなたはそのカードを唱えてもよい。（そのコストは支払う必要がある。タイミングのルールも依然として適用される。）
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — マーフォーク・ウィザード

foreignData.name: 호수 배회자, 엠리
foreignData.text:
이 주문은 당신이 조종하는 마법물체 한 개당 발동하는 비용이 {1}만큼 덜 든다.
호수 배회자, 엠리가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 네 장을 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
{T}: 당신의 무덤에 있는 마법물체 카드를 목표로 정한다. 당신은 이 턴에 그 카드를 발동할 수 있다. (여전히 발동 비용은 지불해야 한다. 발동 시기 규칙도 여전히 적용된다.)

{T}: Escolha um card de artefato alvo em seu cemitério. Você pode conjurar aquele card neste turno. (Você ainda paga seus custos. As regras de tempo ainda se aplicam.)

{T}: выберите целевую карту артефакта на вашем кладбище. Вы можете разыграть ту карту в этом ходу. (Вы должны оплатить ее стоимости. Ограничения по времени продолжают действовать.)

{T}：選擇目標在你墳墓場中的神器牌。本回合中，你可以施放該牌。（你依舊要支付其費用，且仍須遵守施放時機規則。）

name: Emry, Lurker of the Loch
originalText: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard. {T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Emry). The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
The cost reduction ability reduces only the generic mana in Emry’s cost. The colored mana must still be paid.
Once you announce that you’re casting a spell, no player may take actions until the spell has been paid for. Notably, opponents can’t try to change by how much Emry’s cost is reduced.
If Emry’s last ability targets an artifact land card, you can’t play it. Effects that allow you to “cast” a card don’t allow you to play a land card.

You must follow the normal timing permissions and restrictions for the target artifact card. Unless it has flash, you’ll most likely only be able to cast it during your main phase while the stack is empty.
You’ll still pay all costs for a spell cast this way, including additional costs. You may also pay alternative costs if any are available.
Casting the target card causes it to leave your graveyard and become a new object. You can’t cast it again if it returns to your graveyard this turn.

text:

foreignData.flavorText: D'ici, vous pouvez trouver un chemin menant partout.
foreignData.name: Passage merveilleux
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrifiez le Passage merveilleux : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée et mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque. Puis, si vous contrôlez au moins quatre terrains, dégagez ce terrain.

foreignData.flavorText: Da qui si può trovare il sentiero per qualsiasi luogo.
foreignData.name: Passaggio Leggendario
foreignData.text: {T}, Sacrifica il Passaggio Leggendario: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base, mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio. Poi, se controlli quattro o più terre, STAPpa quella terra.

foreignData.flavorText: ここからなら、どこへ行く道でも見つかるかもしれない。
foreignData.name: 寓話の小道
foreignData.text: {T}, 寓話の小道を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カード１枚を探してタップ状態で戦場に出し、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。その後あなたが土地を４つ以上コントロールしているなら、その土地をアンタップする。

foreignData.flavorText: 그곳에서부터는, 어디로 가는 길이든 찾을 수 있다.
foreignData.name: 전설적인 통로
foreignData.text: {T}, 전설적인 통로를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아, 탭된 상태로 전장에 놓은 후, 당신의 서고를 섞는다. 그 후, 당신이 대지를 네 개 이상 조종한다면, 그 대지를 언탭한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Daqui é possível achar o caminho para qualquer lugar.
foreignData.name: Passagem Fabulosa
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrifique Passagem Fabulosa: Procure um card de terreno básico em seu grimório, coloque-o no campo de batalha virado e depois embaralhe seu grimório. Se você controla quatro ou mais terrenos, desvire aquele terreno.

foreignData.flavorText: Отсюда можно найти дорогу куда угодно.
foreignData.name: Сказочный Проход
foreignData.text: {T}, пожертвуйте Сказочный Проход: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли, положите ее на поле битвы повернутой, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку. Затем, если вы контролируете не менее четырех земель, разверните ту землю.

foreignData.flavorText: 此处密径错杂，寻对道路便可通达八方。
foreignData.name: 神奇小径
foreignData.text: {T}，牺牲神奇小径：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。然后如果你操控四个或更多地，则重置该地。

foreignData.flavorText: 此處密徑錯雜，尋對道路便可通達八方。
foreignData.name: 神奇小徑
foreignData.text: {T}，犧牲神奇小徑：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，將之橫置放進戰場，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。然後如果你操控四個或更多地，則重置該地。

name: Fabled Passage
originalText: {T}, Sacrifice Fabled Passage: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Then if you control four or more lands, untap that land.

rulings.text: The land that you put onto the battlefield will be counted when determining whether you control four or more lands, but Fabled Passage will not.
If you control four or more lands, the basic land doesn’t enter the battlefield untapped; it enters tapped and then you untap it.

text: {T}, Sacrifice Fabled Passage: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Then if you control four or more lands, untap that land.

name: Blacklance Paragon

rulings.text: Blacklance Paragon can be the target of its own triggered ability.

text:
Flash
When Blacklance Paragon enters the battlefield, target Knight gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.

foreignData.name: Emry, Wächterin des Sees
foreignData.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken für jedes Artefakt, das du kontrollierst, {1} weniger.
Wenn Emry, Wächterin des Sees, ins Spiel kommt, lege die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof.
{T}: Bestimme eine Artefaktkarte deiner Wahl in deinem Friedhof. Du kannst sie in diesem Zug wirken. (Du bezahlst immer noch ihre Kosten. Zeitpunkts-Einschränkungen gelten weiterhin.)

foreignData.name: Emry, acechadora del lago
foreignData.text:
Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar este hechizo por cada artefacto que controlas.
Cuando Emry, acechadora del lago entre al campo de batalla, pon las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio.
{T}: Elige una carta de artefacto objetivo en tu cementerio. Puedes lanzar esa carta este turno. (Sigues pagando sus costes. Las reglas sobre cuándo jugarla se siguen aplicando.)

foreignData.name: Emry, guetteuse du loch
foreignData.text:
Ce sort coûte {1} de moins à lancer pour chaque artefact que vous contrôlez.
Quand Emry, guetteuse du loch arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque dans votre cimetière.
{T} : Choisissez une carte d'artefact ciblée dans votre cimetière. Vous pouvez lancer cette carte ce tour-ci. (Vous payez toujours ses coûts. Les restrictions de temps s'appliquent quand même.)

foreignData.name: Emry, Nascosta nel Loch
foreignData.text:
Questa magia costa {1} in meno per essere lanciata per ogni artefatto che controlli.
Quando Emry, Nascosta nel Loch entra nel campo di battaglia, metti nel tuo cimitero le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio.
{T}: Scegli una carta artefatto bersaglio nel tuo cimitero. Puoi lanciare quella carta in questo turno. (Paghi comunque i suoi costi. Le regole sulla tempistica si applicano comunque.)

foreignData.name: 湖に潜む者、エムリー
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるためのコストは、あなたがコントロールしているアーティファクト１つにつき{1}少なくなる。
湖に潜む者、エムリーが戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを４枚あなたの墓地に置く。
{T}：あなたの墓地にあるアーティファクト・カード１枚を対象とする。このターン、あなたはそのカードを唱えてもよい。（そのコストは支払う必要がある。タイミングのルールも依然として適用される。）
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — マーフォーク・ウィザード

foreignData.name: 호수 배회자, 엠리
foreignData.text:
이 주문은 당신이 조종하는 마법물체 한 개당 발동하는 비용이 {1}만큼 덜 든다.
호수 배회자, 엠리가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 네 장을 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
{T}: 당신의 무덤에 있는 마법물체 카드를 목표로 정한다. 당신은 이 턴에 그 카드를 발동할 수 있다. (여전히 발동 비용은 지불해야 한다. 발동 시기 규칙도 여전히 적용된다.)

foreignData.name: Emry, Espreitadora do Lago
foreignData.text:
Esta mágica custa {1} a menos para ser conjurada para cada artefato que você controla.
Quando Emry, Espreitadora do Lago, entrar no campo de batalha, coloque os quatro cards do topo de seu grimório em seu cemitério.
{T}: Escolha um card de artefato alvo em seu cemitério. Você pode conjurar aquele card neste turno. (Você ainda paga seus custos. As regras de tempo ainda se aplicam.)

foreignData.name: Эмри, Таящаяся в Озере
foreignData.text:
Разыгрывание этого заклинания стоит на {1} меньше за каждый артефакт под вашим контролем.
Когда Эмри, Таящаяся в Озере выходит на поле битвы, положите четыре верхние карты вашей библиотеки на ваше кладбище.
{T}: выберите целевую карту артефакта на вашем кладбище. Вы можете разыграть ту карту в этом ходу. (Вы должны оплатить ее стоимости. Ограничения по времени продолжают действовать.)

foreignData.name: 深湖潜妖艾莉
foreignData.text:
你每操控一个神器，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。
当深湖潜妖艾莉进战场时，将你牌库顶的四张牌置入你的坟墓场。
{T}：选择目标在你坟墓场中的神器牌。本回合中，你可以施放该牌。（你依旧要支付其费用，且仍须遵守施放时机规则。）

foreignData.name: 深湖潛妖艾莉
foreignData.text:
你每操控一個神器，此咒語便減少{1}來施放。
當深湖潛妖艾莉進戰場時，將你牌庫頂的四張牌置入你的墳墓場。
{T}：選擇目標在你墳墓場中的神器牌。本回合中，你可以施放該牌。（你依舊要支付其費用，且仍須遵守施放時機規則。）

name: Emry, Lurker of the Loch
originalText: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard. {T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Emry). The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
The cost reduction ability reduces only the generic mana in Emry’s cost. The colored mana must still be paid.
Once you announce that you’re casting a spell, no player may take actions until the spell has been paid for. Notably, opponents can’t try to change by how much Emry’s cost is reduced.
If Emry’s last ability targets an artifact land card, you can’t play it. Effects that allow you to “cast” a card don’t allow you to play a land card.

You must follow the normal timing permissions and restrictions for the target artifact card. Unless it has flash, you’ll most likely only be able to cast it during your main phase while the stack is empty.
You’ll still pay all costs for a spell cast this way, including additional costs. You may also pay alternative costs if any are available.
Casting the target card causes it to leave your graveyard and become a new object. You can’t cast it again if it returns to your graveyard this turn.

text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.
When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.
{T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

flavorText: "Old battlefields make great gardens. So rich from the blood of the fallen."

foreignData.text: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe. (Schicke diese Karte dann ins Exil. Du kannst sie später als Kreatur aus dem Exil wirken.)

foreignData.name: Ritual de temporada
foreignData.text: Agrega un maná de cualquier color. (Luego, exilia esta carta. Puedes lanzar la criatura más adelante desde el exilio.)

foreignData.name: Rituel saisonnier
foreignData.text: Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix. (Puis exilez cette carte. Vous pouvez lancer la créature plus tard depuis l'exil.)

foreignData.name: Rito Stagionale
foreignData.text: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore. (Poi esilia questa carta. Puoi lanciare la creatura in seguito dall'esilio.)

foreignData.name: 季（き）節（せつ）の儀（ぎ）式（しき）
foreignData.text: 好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。（その後、このカードを追放する。あなたは後で追放領域からこのクリーチャーを唱えてもよい。）
foreignData.type: ソーサリー ― 出来事

foreignData.name: 계절 의식
foreignData.text: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다. (그 후 이 카드를 추방한다. 당신은 나중에 추방 영역에서 이 생물을 발동할 수 있다.)

foreignData.name: Ritual Sazonal
foreignData.text: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor. (Depois, exile este card. Você pode conjurar a criatura posteriormente do exílio.)

foreignData.name: Сезонный Ритуал
foreignData.text: Добавьте одну ману любого цвета. (Затем изгоните эту карту. Позже вы можете разыграть эту карту как существо из изгнания.)

foreignData.name: 季节仪式
foreignData.text: 加一点任意颜色的法术力。（然后放逐此牌。之后你还可以从放逐区中施放该生物。）

foreignData.name: 季節儀式
foreignData.text: 加一點任意顏色的魔法力。（然後放逐此牌。之後你還可以從放逐區中施放該生物。）

name: Seasonal Ritual
originalText: Add one mana of any color. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

rulings.text: An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it’s in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose converted mana cost is 1. It can’t be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card’s normal characteristics. The spell’s color, mana cost, converted mana cost, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it’s legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can’t cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner’s graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won’t be exiled and the spell’s controller won’t be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won’t give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you’ll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it’s not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it’s a token) or cease to be a copy (if it’s a nontoken permanent), and so you won’t be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn’t casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

text: Add one mana of any color. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

flavorText: In the wilds, the ravens steal far more than baubles.

foreignData.flavorText: In der Wildnis stehlen die Raben weit mehr als nur Tand.
foreignData.name: Gedankenraub
foreignData.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du bestimmst davon eine Nichtland-Karte. Der Spieler wirft die bestimmte Karte ab. Du kannst eine Karte mit einem Abenteuer, die der Spieler besitzt, aus dem Exil auf den Friedhof des Spielers legen.

foreignData.flavorText: En las tierras salvajes, los cuervos no solo roban baratijas.
foreignData.name: Robo de recuerdos
foreignData.text: El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Tú eliges de ahí una carta que no sea tierra. Ese jugador descarta esa carta. Puedes poner en el cementerio de ese jugador desde el exilio una carta de la cual ese jugador sea propietario que tenga una Aventura.

foreignData.flavorText: Dans les friches, les corbeaux ne volent pas que des babioles.
foreignData.name: Vol de mémoire
foreignData.text: L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Vous y choisissez une carte non-terrain. Ce joueur se défausse de cette carte. Vous pouvez mettre, depuis l'exil, une carte avec une aventure que ce joueur possède dans le cimetière de ce joueur.

foreignData.flavorText: Nelle terre selvagge, i corvi rubano molto più che gingilli.
foreignData.name: Sottrazione di Memoria
foreignData.text: Un avversario bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra da quella mano. Quel giocatore scarta quella carta. Puoi mettere una carta che ha un'Avventura e di cui quel giocatore è proprietario dall'esilio nel cimitero di quel giocatore.

foreignData.flavorText: 僻境では、カラスが盗むのはつまらない物ではない。
foreignData.name: 記憶盗み
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中から土地でないカード１枚を選ぶ。そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。あなたは、追放領域からそのプレイヤーがオーナーであり出来事を持つカード１枚を、そのプレイヤーの墓地に置いてもよい。

foreignData.flavorText: 야생지에서, 까마귀들은 그냥 반짝이는 것들보다 더 많은 것들을 훔친다.
foreignData.name: 기억 도둑
foreignData.text: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 그중 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 선택한다. 그 플레이어는 그 카드를 버린다. 당신은 추방 영역에서 그 플레이어가 소유한 모험을 가진 카드 한 장을 그 플레이어의 무덤에 넣을 수 있다.

foreignData.flavorText: Nas terras selvagens, os corvos roubam muito mais do que bugigangas.
foreignData.name: Roubo de Memória
foreignData.text: O oponente alvo revela a própria mão. Você escolhe um card que não seja um terreno da mão dele. Aquele jogador descarta aquele card. Você pode colocar no cemitério daquele jogador do exílio um card que aquele jogador possua com uma Aventura.

foreignData.flavorText: В диких дебрях вороны крадут куда больше, чем простые безделушки.
foreignData.name: Кража Воспоминаний
foreignData.text: Целевой оппонент показывает свою руку. Вы выбираете из нее карту, не являющуюся землей. Тот игрок сбрасывает ту карту. Вы можете положить принадлежащую тому игроку карту с Приключением из изгнания на кладбище того игрока.

foreignData.flavorText: 幻野之中的乌鸦，偷的可不只有饰品。
foreignData.name: 窃取记忆
foreignData.text: 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非地牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。你可以将一张由该牌手拥有且具有历险的牌从放逐区置入该牌手的坟墓场。

foreignData.flavorText: 幻野之中的烏鴉，偷的可不只有飾品。
foreignData.name: 竊取記憶
foreignData.text: 目標對手展示其手牌。你選擇其中一張非地牌。該玩家棄掉該牌。你可以將一張由該玩家擁有且具有歷險的牌從放逐區置入該玩家的墳墓場。

name: Memory Theft
originalText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.

rulings.text: You choose which exiled adventurer card, if any, to put into that player’s graveyard after seeing their hand. You may do this even if that player has no nonland cards in hand, or even no cards at all.
Memory Theft allows you to put any face-up exiled card with an Adventure that player owns into their graveyard, not just one that was cast as an Adventure and exiled.

An effect may refer to a card, spell, or permanent that “has an Adventure.” This refers to a card, spell, or permanent that has an adventurer card’s set of alternative characteristics, even if they’re not being used and even if that card was never cast as an Adventure.
If an effect refers to a creature card, creature spell, or creature that has an Adventure, it won’t find an instant or sorcery spell on the stack that’s been cast as an Adventure.

text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.

name: Memory Theft
originalText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.

rulings.text: You choose which exiled adventurer card, if any, to put into that player’s graveyard after seeing their hand. You may do this even if that player has no nonland cards in hand, or even no cards at all.
Memory Theft allows you to put any face-up exiled card with an Adventure that player owns into their graveyard, not just one that was cast as an Adventure and exiled.

An effect may refer to a card, spell, or permanent that “has an Adventure.” This refers to a card, spell, or permanent that has an adventurer card’s set of alternative characteristics, even if they’re not being used and even if that card was never cast as an Adventure.
If an effect refers to a creature card, creature spell, or creature that has an Adventure, it won’t find an instant or sorcery spell on the stack that’s been cast as an Adventure.

text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.

name: Witch's Vengeance
originalText: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.

rulings.text: You choose a creature type as Witch’s Vengeance resolves, not as you cast it. No player may take actions between the time you choose a creature type and the time those creatures get -3/-3.

To choose a creature type, you must choose an existing creature type, such as Human or Knight. You can’t choose multiple creature types, such as “Human Knight,” but choosing “Human” is enough to affect a Human Knight. Card types such as artifact can’t be chosen; nor can supertypes such as legendary; nor can subtypes that aren’t creature types, such as Vehicle.

Witch’s Vengeance affects only creatures of the chosen type that are on the battlefield at the time it resolves. This includes creatures you control, creatures with hexproof, and creatures with protection from black. Creatures that enter the battlefield or become the chosen type later in the turn won’t get -3/-3.

text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.
